summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plats 49E and 50W, Pages 127 and 128 of the Official Land Use Map of The City of Seattle (pages 70 and 71, Exhibit E-2 Ordinance 106200) to rezone approximately forty-four acres of submerged property lying north of Harbor Island and the West and East Waterways in Elliott Bay from Single Family 9600 (SF 9600) to Heavy Industrial (IH) and to amend the environmental classification from Conservancy Natural (CN) to Urban Development (UD). (Petition of Mark J. Held, agent for Todd Pacific Shipyards, and the Department of Construction and Land Use; C.F. 291731).
